panel.name: permissions
panel.text: This floater entitles you to set the default permissions for newly uploaded or created assets.

check_box.name: share_with_group
check_box.tool_tip: Checking this box sets the copy, modify and transfer permissions for the persons pertaining to the same group as the group set for the asset.
check_box.label: Share with group

text.name: AssetTypePermsLabel
text.tool_tip: Checking a box below causes the corresponding default permission(s) to be overridden for the associated asset type.

check_box.name: full_perm_notecards
check_box.tool_tip: Notecards are normally full permissions. If this box is un-checked, then the default 'Next owner' permissions specified above will also apply to new notecards.
check_box.label: Full permissions notecards

check_box.name: full_perm_snapshots
check_box.tool_tip: Unlike textures, snapshots are normally full permissions. If this box is un-checked, then the default 'Next owner' permissions specified above will also apply to new snapshots.
check_box.label: Full permissions snapshots

check_box.name: no_mod_scripts
check_box.tool_tip: If you wish to be able to share the scripts but not their source and keep the latter closed instead, you may check this box: it will prevent the 'next owner can modify' permission as well as the 'share with group' permission (which would otherwise imply mod-ok for the group members) for new scripts.
check_box.label: No-modify (closed source) scripts
